text: aur vahee hai, jisane saagar ko vash mein kar rakha hai, taaki tum usase taaza[1] maans khao aur usase alankaar[2] nikaalo, jise pahanate ho tatha tum naukaon ko dekhate ho ki saagar mein (jal ko) phaadatee huee chalatee hain aur isalie taaki tum us allaah ke anugrah[3] kee khoj karo aur taaki krtagy bano
